Initializer# init(_:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init(_ container: AttributeContainer)
```

Available when `Key` is `NSAttributedString.Key` and `Value` is `Any`.## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Dictionary/init(_:)#see-also)
